00061 #ifndef __GNUC__
00062    #pragma optimize=none 
00063    void Set_cpu_prescaler(U8 x)
00064    {
00065       U8 save_int=SREG&0x80;
00066       Disable_interrupt();
00067       CLKPR=(1<<CLKPCE);
00068       CLKPR=x;
00069       if(save_int) { Enable_interrupt(); }
00070    }
00071 #endif

00081 void set_power_down_mode(void)
00082 {
00083    Setup_power_down_mode();
00084    Sleep_instruction();
00085 }

00099    Setup_idle_mode();
00100    Sleep_instruction();
00101 }

00170 void Clock_switch_external(void)
00171 {
00172   Enable_external_clock();
00173   while (!External_clock_ready());
00174   Select_external_clock();
00175   Disable_RC_clock();
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00187 void Clock_switch_internal(void)
00188 {
00189   Enable_RC_clock();
00190   while (!RC_clock_ready());
00191   Select_RC_clock();
00192   Disable_external_clock();
00193 }
